snippet: Gary Andersen informed Wisconsin that he was stepping down to become the coach at Oregon State.
abstract: Gary Andersen, coach of Wisconsin's football team, is resigning to coach at Oregon State; other college football news noted.
lead_paragraph: Gary Andersen informed Wisconsin that he was stepping down to become the coach at Oregon State.

headline.main: Wisconsin Coach Takes Job at Oregon State
headline.print_headline: Wisconsin Coach Takes Job at Oregon State
